job_history.title: Software Developer

job_history.title: Lead Developer
tasks: Build and maintain CMS system which allows businesses to create renewable contracts
Source Control Manager - responsible for managing multiple repositories. Handle all pull requests. Coordinate and perform code reviews and merges.  Deploy code across server environments.
Assist in managing bug tracking and assignments to other developers.
featured_projects: MA BizAcademy: Convert marketing material catalog from Flex to ReactJS
Webform Appointments: Build an embeddable dynamic webform that allows users to pick from and schedule available upcoming appointments

SMS Credit System: Built a new subscription based system for customers to buy credits used for communicating with their own customers via SMS. In addition to monthly billing, the system also auto-repurchases more credits when a customer-configurable threshold is reached. The billing system integrates with multiple payment processors as well as Twilio. Project was completed using a combination of ReactJS and ColdFusion.

AMS Advantage: Integral in building a new payment processing system for aggregating payments and charging charging through multiple payment processors. Built one-click account creation tool, and refund management tool integrated with ProPay Systems, and payment processing through Sage Payments.
